Battle City.name: Harpie Lady Sisters
Battle City.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned with "Elegant Egotist".

Battle City.name: Armored Zombie
Battle City.effect: This warrior blindly swings a deadly blade with devastating force.

Battle City.name: Clown Zombie
Battle City.effect: A clown revived by the powers of darkness. Its deadly dance has sent many monsters to their graves.

Battle City.name: Gate Guardian
Battle City.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Sanga of the Thunder", "Kazejin", and "Suijin".

Battle City.name: Red-Eyes Black Metal Dragon
Battle City.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your Deck) by Tributing "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" equipped with "Metalmorph".

Battle City.name: Dark Sage
Battle City.effect: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand or Deck) by Tributing 1 "Dark Magician" immediately after applying the effect of "Time Wizard" in which you called the coin toss right. When Special Summoned this way: Add 1 Spell Card from your Deck to your hand.

Battle City.name: Reaper of the Cards
Battle City.effect: FLIP: Select 1 Trap Card on the field and destroy it. If the selected card is Set, pick up and see the card. If it is a Trap Card, it is destroyed. If it is a Spell Card, return it to its original position.

Battle City.name: Crass Clown
Battle City.effect: When this card is changed from Defense Position to Attack Position, return 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field to the owner's hand.

Battle City.name: Pumpking the King of Ghosts
Battle City.effect: If "Castle of Dark Illusions" is face-up on the field, increase the ATK and DEF of this card by 100 points. As long as this "Castle of Dark Illusions" remains face-up on the field, the ATK and DEF of this card continues to increase by 100 points during each of your Standby Phases. This effect continues until your 4th turn after the card is activated.

Battle City.name: The Wicked Worm Beast
Battle City.effect: This face-up card on the field is returned to the owner's hand during the End Phase of your turn.

Battle City.name: Penguin Knight
Battle City.effect: When this card is sent directly from your Deck to the Graveyard by an effect of a card controlled by your opponent, unite your Graveyard cards and your own Deck, shuffle them and form a new Deck.

Battle City.name: Sanga of the Thunder
Battle City.effect: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

Battle City.name: Suijin
Battle City.effect: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

Battle City.name: Monster Tamer
Battle City.effect: A master of monsters that exercises control over several creatures.

Battle City.name: Kazejin
Battle City.effect: During damage calculation in your opponent's turn, if this card is being attacked: You can target the attacking monster; make that target's ATK 0 during damage calculation only (this is a Quick Effect). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

Battle City.name: Copycat
Battle City.effect: If this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; this card's ATK/DEF become equal to that monster's original ATK/DEF.

Battle City.name: Harpie's Pet Dragon
Battle City.effect: Gains 300 ATK/DEF for each "Harpie Lady" on the field.

Battle City.name: Blast Sphere
Battle City.effect: If this face-down Defense Position card was attacked by an opponent's monster, before damage calculation: Equip this card to the attacking monster. Then, during your opponent's next Standby Phase: Destroy the monster this card is equipped to, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK the destroyed monster had on the field.

Battle City.name: Barrel Dragon
Battle City.effect: Once per turn: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; toss a coin 3 times and destroy it if at least 2 of the results are heads.

Battle City.name: Dark-Eyes Illusionist
Battle City.effect: FLIP: Target 1 monster on the field; it cannot attack while this card is face-up on the field.

Battle City.name: Jigen Bakudan
Battle City.effect: FLIP: After this card is flipped, Tribute it during your Standby Phase to destroy all monsters you control and inflict damage equal to half of the total ATK of the destroyed cards (excluding this monster) to your opponent.

Battle City.name: Mask of Darkness
Battle City.effect: FLIP: Target 1 Trap in your GY; add that target to your hand.

Battle City.name: Burning Land
Battle City.effect: When this card is activated: If there are any Field Spell Cards on the field, destroy them. During each player's Standby Phase: The turn player takes 500 damage.

Battle City.name: Makiu, the Magical Mist
Battle City.effect: Target 1 "Summoned Skull", or 1 Thunder monster, in your Monster Zone; destroy all monsters your opponent controls with DEF less than or equal to the ATK of that monster. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

Battle City.name: Negate Attack
Battle City.effect: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Target the attacking monster; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.

Battle City.name: Magical Labyrinth
Battle City.effect: Equip only to "Labyrinth Wall". You can Tribute the equipped monster; Special Summon "Wall Shadow" from your Deck.

Battle City.name: Mystic Box
Battle City.effect: Target 1 monster your opponent controls and 1 monster you control; destroy the first target, then give control of the second target to your opponent.

Battle City.name: Invigoration
Battle City.effect: An EARTH monster equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Battle City.name: Riryoku
Battle City.effect: Target 2 face-up monsters on the field; halve the ATK of 1 monster, and if you do, add that lost ATK to the other monster. These effects last until the end of this turn.

Battle City.name: The Eye of Truth
Battle City.effect: Your opponent must keep their hand revealed. Once per turn, during your opponent's Standby Phase, if they have a Spell(s) in their hand: They gain 1000 LP if they have a Spell(s) in their hand at resolution.

Battle City.name: De-Spell
Battle City.effect: Target 1 face-up Spell, or 1 Set Spell/Trap, on the field; destroy that target if it is a Spell. (If the target is Set, reveal it.)

Battle City.name: Gift of The Mystical Elf
Battle City.effect: Increase your Life Points by 300 points for each monster on the field.

Battle City.name: Kuriboh
Battle City.effect: During damage calculation, if your opponent's monster attacks (Quick Effect): You can discard this card; you take no battle damage from that battle.

Battle City.name: Thousand-Eyes Idol
Battle City.effect: A wicked entity that controls the hearts of men, its thousand eyes are able to see and expand the negative influences in an individual's soul.

Battle City.name: Mystical Elf
Battle City.effect: A delicate elf that lacks offense, but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

Battle City.name: Harpie Lady
Battle City.effect: This human-shaped animal with wings is beautiful to watch but deadly in battle.

Battle City.name: Umi
Battle City.effect: All Fish, Sea Serpent, Thunder, and Aqua monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF, also all Machine and Pyro monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF.

Battle City.name: Thousand Dragon
Battle City.effect: "Time Wizard" + "Baby Dragon"

Battle City.name: Raigeki
Battle City.effect: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.
